channel.title: Posts on chitreshblog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on chitreshblog

item.title: Feelings
item.description: Well well where do i start umm Lets start with feelings how do i feel at the moment ? I feel anxious about the future There is so much happening in the world rightnow trying to keep up with all of that sometimes gets you demotivated Also i am tired, i need to find a way through which I can distribute my energy wisely I don’t know what i am talking right now i can’t express it i am not sad and i am not happy either

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World! Welcome to my first blog post on chitreshblog. Why did I start this ? To share what i am doing , basically i am doing new stuff like everyday so sharing on instagram everyday is such a drag plus a lot of people asked me why did I stop my last blog after my first post because It was too much of writing code but eh I found a simpler way,so expect new blogs
